REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A f1592 reute d f BC-WESTERN-DIGITAL-CORP 04-08 0054

TEXT.TITLE: WESTERN DIGITAL CORP <WDC> REDEEMS DEBT
TEXT.BODY: Western Digtial Corp said it has completed the redemption of its 47 mln dlr, 6-3/4 pct convertible subordinated debentures due 2011. The redemption resulted in the issuance of 2,685,142 shares of the company's common stock, Western Digital said. Reuter
